00066 SunDialog::SunDialog(  TLightKit* currentLightKit, std::vector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList, std::vector< TSunShapeFactory* > m_sunshapeFactoryList, QWidget* parent )
00067 :QDialog( parent ), m_currentLightKit( currentLightKit ), m_sunShape( 0 ), m_shape( 0 ), m_shapeList( shapeFactoryList ), m_sunshapeList( m_sunshapeFactoryList )
00068 {
00069         Trace trace( "SunDialog::SunDialog", false );
00070         
00071         if( currentLightKit )
00072         {
00073                 if( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) )    m_sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00074                 if( currentLightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) m_shape = static_cast< TShape* >( currentLightKit->getPart( "icon", false )->copy( true ) );
00075         }
00076         
00077         QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout;
00078     layout->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "hboxLayout" ) );
00079         layout->setSizeConstraint(QLayout::SetFixedSize);
00080         
00081     QVBoxLayout* vboxLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00082     m_tabWidget = new QTabWidget(  );
00083     vboxLayout->addWidget( m_tabWidget );
00084       
00085         //DirectionTab();
00086         SunshapeTab();
00087 
00088     QDialogButtonBox* buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00089     buttonBox->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "buttonBox" ) );
00090     buttonBox->setStandardButtons(QDialogButtonBox::Cancel|QDialogButtonBox::NoButton|QDialogButtonBox::Ok);
00091     connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT(accept()));
00092         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( rejected() ), this, SLOT(reject()));
00093     vboxLayout->addWidget( buttonBox );
00094     
00095 
00096     layout->addLayout( vboxLayout );
00097   
00098     setLayout( layout );
00099         
00100 }

00107 TLightKit* SunDialog::GetTLightKit()
00108 {
00109         Trace trace( "SunDialog::GetTLightKit", false );
00110         
00111         TLightKit* lightKit = new TLightKit;
00112         lightKit->setPart( "tsunshape", m_sunShape );
00113         lightKit->setPart( "icon", m_shape );
00114         
00115         /*//Trasform calculation
00116         SetAngles();  
00117     Vector3D direction = Vector3D( sin( m_zenith ) * sin( m_azimuth ), cos( m_zenith ), -sin( m_zenith )*cos( m_azimuth ) );
00118 
00119         Point3D center = Point3D( 0, 0, 0 ) + ( direction * 1000 );
00120         SbMatrix translate;
00121         translate.setTranslate( SbVec3f( center.x, center.y, center.z ) );
00122         
00123         SbMatrix rotX;
00124         rotX.setRotate( SbRotation( SbVec3f( 1, 0, 0 ), -m_zenith ) );
00125         
00126         SbMatrix rotY;
00127         rotY.setRotate( SbRotation( SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 ), -m_azimuth ) );
00128         
00129         SbMatrix coinMatrix = rotX* rotY* translate;
00130         
00131         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
00132         transform->setMatrix( coinMatrix );
00133         
00134         lightKit->setPart( "transform", transform );*/
00135         
00136         return lightKit;
00137         
00138 }

00140 void SunDialog::changeSunshape( int index )
00141 {
00142         Trace trace( "SunDialog::changeSunshape", false );
00143         
00144         QLayout* frameLayout = m_sunshapeParameters->layout();
00145         if( !frameLayout ) return;
00146         int children = frameLayout->count();
00147         for( int i = 0; i< children; i++ )
00148                 frameLayout->removeItem ( frameLayout->itemAt( i ) );
00149         
00150         FieldContainerWidget* nodeContainer;    
00151         if ( index == 0 )
00152         {
00153                 nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( 0, QString() );
00154         }
00155         else
00156         {
00157                 if( index == m_currentSunShapeIndex)
00158                 {
00159                         TSunShape* sunshape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( m_currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00160                         m_sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( sunshape->copy( true ) );
00161                 }
00162                 else
00163                 {
00164                         TSunShapeFactory* sunshapeFactory = m_sunshapeList[index -1 ];
00165                         m_sunShape =  sunshapeFactory->CreateTSunShape();
00166                 }
00167                 nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( m_sunShape, QString() );
00168 
00169         }
00170         nodeContainer->setFixedSize( QSize( 200, 100 ) );
00171         frameLayout->addWidget( nodeContainer );
00172 }
00173 
00174 void SunDialog::changeShape( int index )
00175 {
00176         Trace trace( "SunDialog::changeShape", false );
00177         
00178         QLayout* frameLayout = m_shapeParameters->layout();
00179 
00180         if( !frameLayout && frameLayout != 0 ) return;
00181         int children = frameLayout->count();
00182         for( int i = 0; i< children; i++ )
00183                 frameLayout->removeItem ( frameLayout->itemAt( i ) );
00184         FieldContainerWidget* nodeContainer;
00185         if ( index == 0 )
00186         {
00187                 nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( 0, QString() );
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191                 if( index == m_currentShapeIndex)
00192                 {
00193                         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( m_currentLightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00194                         m_shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shape->copy( true ) );
00195                         
00196                 }
00197                 else
00198                 {
00199                         TShapeFactory* shapeFactory = m_shapeList[index -1 ];
00200                         m_shape =  shapeFactory->CreateTShape();
00201                 }
00202                 nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( m_shape, QString() );
00203         }
00204         
00205         nodeContainer->setFixedSize( QSize( 200, 100 ) );
00206         frameLayout->addWidget( nodeContainer ); 
00207 }

00209 void SunDialog::openMarble()
00210 {
00211         Trace trace( "SunDialog::openMarble", false );
00212         MapDialog marbleDialog;
00213         marbleDialog.SetCoordinates( m_latitudeSpin->value() * ( tgc::Pi / 180 ), m_longitudeSpin->value() * ( tgc::Pi / 180 ) );
00214         
00215         if( marbleDialog.exec() )
00216         {
00217                 double longitude;
00218                 double latitude;
00219                 
00220                 marbleDialog.GetCoordinates( &longitude, &latitude );
00221                 
00222                 m_longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );
00223                 m_latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );               
00224         }
00225 }

00354 void SunDialog::SunshapeTab()
00355 {
00356         Trace trace( "SunDialog::SunshapeTab", false );
00357         
00358         QWidget* sunShape = new QWidget;
00359         sunShape->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "sunShape" ) );
00360     m_tabWidget->addTab( sunShape, tr( "Sun Shape") );
00361     
00362     QVBoxLayout* sunShapeLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00363     sunShape->setLayout( sunShapeLayout );
00364     
00365     QGroupBox* sunshapeBox = new QGroupBox;
00366     sunshapeBox->setTitle ( "Sunshape" );
00367     sunShapeLayout->addWidget( sunshapeBox );
00368     
00369         QGridLayout* gridSunshape = new QGridLayout;
00370         sunshapeBox->setLayout( gridSunshape );
00371         
00372         QLabel* typeLabel = new QLabel;
00373         typeLabel->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "typeLabel" ) );
00374         typeLabel->setText( "Sunshape type: " );
00375         gridSunshape->addWidget(typeLabel, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00376         
00377         m_sunshapeCombox = new QComboBox;
00378         gridSunshape->addWidget(m_sunshapeCombox, 0, 2, 1, 2);
00379         connect( m_sunshapeCombox, SIGNAL( activated ( int ) ), this, SLOT( changeSunshape( int ) ) );
00380         m_sunshapeCombox->addItem ( "---" );
00381         for( int i = 0; i < (int)m_sunshapeList.size(); i++ )
00382                 m_sunshapeCombox->addItem ( m_sunshapeList[i]->TSunShapeIcon(), m_sunshapeList[i]->TSunShapeName() );
00383         
00384         m_currentSunShapeIndex = 0;
00385         if( m_sunShape )
00386         {
00387                 QString name( m_sunShape->getTypeId().getName() );
00388                 m_currentSunShapeIndex = m_sunshapeCombox->findText ( name );
00389         }
00390         
00391         m_sunshapeParameters = new QFrame;
00392         gridSunshape->addWidget(m_sunshapeParameters, 1, 2, 3, 2);
00393         QVBoxLayout* parametersSunShapeLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00394         parametersSunShapeLayout->setContentsMargins ( 0, 0, 0, 0 );
00395         parametersSunShapeLayout->setSizeConstraint( QLayout::SetFixedSize ); 
00396     m_sunshapeParameters->setLayout( parametersSunShapeLayout );
00397     changeSunshape( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00398     m_sunshapeCombox->setCurrentIndex( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00399          
00400         QGroupBox* shapeBox = new QGroupBox;
00401     shapeBox->setTitle ( "Input Aperture" );
00402     sunShapeLayout->addWidget( shapeBox );
00403     
00404     QGridLayout* gridShape = new QGridLayout;
00405         shapeBox->setLayout( gridShape );
00406         
00407         QLabel* shapeLabel = new QLabel;
00408         shapeLabel->setText( "Shape type: " );
00409         gridShape->addWidget(shapeLabel, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00410         
00411         m_shapeCombox = new QComboBox;
00412         gridShape->addWidget(m_shapeCombox, 0, 2, 1, 2);
00413         m_shapeCombox->addItem ( "---" );
00414         for( int j = 0; j <(int) m_shapeList.size(); j++ )
00415                 m_shapeCombox->addItem ( m_shapeList[j]->TShapeIcon(), m_shapeList[j]->TShapeName() );
00416                 
00417         connect( m_shapeCombox, SIGNAL( currentIndexChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( changeShape( int ) ) );
00418         
00419         m_currentShapeIndex = 0;
00420         if( m_shape )
00421         {
00422                 QString name( m_shape->getTypeId().getName() );
00423                 m_currentShapeIndex = m_shapeCombox->findText ( name );
00424         } 
00425         
00426         m_shapeParameters = new QFrame;
00427         gridShape->addWidget(m_shapeParameters, 1, 2, 3, 2);
00428         QVBoxLayout* parametersShapeLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00429         parametersShapeLayout->setContentsMargins ( 0, 0, 0, 0 );
00430         parametersShapeLayout->setSizeConstraint( QLayout::SetFixedSize ); 
00431     m_shapeParameters->setLayout( parametersShapeLayout );
00432     changeShape( m_currentShapeIndex );
00433     m_shapeCombox->setCurrentIndex( m_currentShapeIndex );
00434 }
00435 
00436 void SunDialog::SetAngles()
00437 {
00438         Trace trace( "SunDialog::SetAngles", false );
00439         if( m_radioAngles->isChecked() )
00440         {
00441                 m_zenith = m_zenithSpin->value() * ( tgc::Pi / 180);
00442                 m_azimuth = m_azimuthSpin->value() * ( tgc::Pi / 180);
00443         }
00444         else if( m_radioCalculates->isChecked() )
00445         {
00446                 double hours, minutes, seconds;
00447                 QTime time = m_timeEdit->time();
00448         
00449                 hours = time.hour ();
00450                 minutes = time.minute ();
00451                 seconds = time.second ();
00452                 
00453                 QDate date = m_dateEdit->date();
00454                 int year = date.year();
00455                 int month = date.month();
00456                 int day = date.day();
00457                 
00458                 
00459                 cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00460         
00461                 double longitude = m_longitudeSpin->value();
00462                 double latitude = m_latitudeSpin->value();
00463             
00464                 //Calculate sun position
00465                 cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00466                 cSunCoordinates results;
00467                 sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00468                 
00469                 m_zenith = results.dZenithAngle * ( tgc::Pi / 180);
00470                 m_azimuth = results.dAzimuth * ( tgc::Pi / 180);
00471         }
00472 }
Generated on Sat Jul 19 22:14:37 2008 for Tonatiuh by  1.5.6
